import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' //only need props as a param if we are passing in props to this component (we are going to here). const Add = (props) => { let createPet = { breed: '', gender: '', color: '', size: '', age: '', description: '', image_url: '' } const [pet, setPet] = useState(createPet) const handleChange = (e) => { setPet({ ...pet, [e.target.breed]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() props.handleCreate(pet) } return ( <>

) } export default Add
